title: (x) Stevie Nicks "Crystal Visions" font - Yolanda {Angel}
content:
This font from the cover artwork for Stevie Nicks’ Crystal Visions looks custom—but I wonder if it’s just a customized type, instead. Anyone know?

[http://www.nicksfix.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414165317/http:/www.nicksfix.com/ "http://www.nicksfix.com/")

Thanks!

 [‹ "How does one stay seductive..." italic serif from Women's Wear Daily ad](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414165317/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33139 "Go to previous forum topic") [Dickson's very bold slab serif ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414165317/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33137 "Go to next forum topic")
author: stevier

comments.content:
Crystal Visions looks very Solotype-esque, but I can’t find a match.

[Blue Point](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414165317/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/solotype/blue-point/) has the right V.
